participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and adventurous, with a hint of introversion. Enjoys connecting with others.
participant_1.background: My work life is boring, but I love my whiskey and Comic Con. People do not like me too much but I like them anyways. I think I should bake my grandson some chocolate cake for his birthday. I am an only child and I am excited to start a new chapter in my life at college. I love to play with my cat Mater when I have free time.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and thoughtful, enjoys a healthy lifestyle and finds joy in small everyday moments.
participant_2.background: I just fed my dog. I love walking in the park. I sell clothing on Facebook. I lift heavy weights and enjoy a meatless diet. I spend a lot of time watching obscure foreign films on Netflix.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
Not bad! Just fed my dog and now I'm relaxing. What about you?
I'm doing well! Getting ready to start my new job at college.
Oh that's exciting! What are you studying?
I'm studying business. I'm a little nervous, but excited to start this new chapter in my life.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, watch movies, and hang out with my friends.
Sounds like we have a lot in common! I love to watch movies and play video games too.
That's awesome! We should get together sometime and watch a movie or play some video games.
That sounds like a great idea! I'm free this weekend.
Me too! I'll DM you my number and we can figure out a time to meet.
